text.emotional: You need a cane harvester. Two choices: Either a self-propelled harvester OR (and this is the cheaper option) a harvester implement to attach to your tractor.
text.silence: {.} you need a cane harvester {....} two choices {....} either a self propelled harvester {...} or {....} [bracketed] {....} a harvester {..} implement {...} to attach to your tractor {...}
